text:
Note that with a weight (of investor assets) of 125% in the market portfolio, the
investor borrows an amount equal to 25% of his portfolio assets at 5%. An investor
with $10,000 would then borrow $2,500 and invest a total of $12,500 in the market
portfolio. This leveraged portfolio will have an expected return of 12.5% and standard
deviation of 25%.
